articles.title: New work achieves a pure quantum state without the need for cooling - Phys.org
articles.description: Three nano-glass spheres cling to one another. They form a tower-like cluster, similar to when you pile three scoops of ice cream on top of one another—only much smaller. The diameter of the nano cluster is ten times smaller than that of a human hair.
